locations: Balboa Park - 1549 El Prado, San Diego, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: 29-year-old Virginia Hudson is an appraiser and amateur sleuth. She is often asked by police or clients to appraise items, which have fallen through the cracks. It's Virginia's responsibility to value the items. She is responsible for tracing the item to an heir or rightful owner, but ultimately goes about solving a mystery. All the episodes will be filmed in San Diego and use San Diego's unique juxtaposition to Mexico and our rich historical background to further story lines.
imdb.title: GasLamp
plot: A young appraiser searches out the value of forgotten relics as she struggles to find the deeper value of her own self worth.::LB McGill

29-year-old Virginia Hudson is an appraiser and amateur sleuth. She is often asked by police or clients to appraise items, which have fallen through the cracks. It's Virginia's responsibility to value the items. She is responsible for tracing the item to an heir or rightful owner, but ultimately goes about solving a mystery. All the episodes will be filmed in San Diego and use San Diego's unique juxtaposition to Mexico and our rich historical background to further story lines.::LB McGill
